title: Iron Man
notes: Post-credits scene introduces Nick Fury and the Avengers Initiative.

title: The Incredible Hulk
notes: Starring Edward Norton as Bruce Banner. Tony Stark cameo in post-credits.

title: Iron Man 2
notes: Introduces Black Widow. Post-credits shows Mjolnir in New Mexico.

title: Thor
notes: Introduces Loki and the Cosmic side of the MCU. Post-credits shows the Tesseract.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
notes: Set primarily in WWII. Post-credits is the first Avengers teaser.

title: Marvel's The Avengers
notes: First team-up film. Mid-credits reveals Thanos. Post-credits is the shawarma scene.

title: Iron Man 3
notes: Deals with Tony's PTSD from the Battle of New York. No traditional post-credits scene.

title: Thor: The Dark World
notes: Introduces the Reality Stone (the Aether). Mid-credits scene introduces the Collector.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
notes: Political thriller that dismantles S.H.I.E.L.D. Introduces Falcon and Winter Soldier.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
notes: Major expansion of the Cosmic MCU. Introduces the Power Stone and the full Guardians team.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
notes: Introduces Vision, Scarlet Witch, Quicksilver, and Ultron. Mid-credits shows Thanos with the Infinity Gauntlet.

title: Ant-Man
notes: Introduces the Quantum Realm and the Pym Particle technology. Mid-credits shows the Wasp suit prototype.

title: Captain America: Civil War
notes: Introduces Black Panther and Spider-Man to the MCU. The Avengers are divided by the Sokovia Accords.

title: Doctor Strange
notes: Introduces magic, the Multiverse, and the Time Stone (Eye of Agamotto). Mid-credits sets up Thor: Ragnarok.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
notes: Explores Peter Quill's parentage. Post-credits scenes introduce Adam Warlock's cocoon and the original Guardians.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
notes: First MCU Spider-Man solo film. Establishes Peter Parker's high school life and connection to Tony Stark.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
notes: Revamps Thor's tone, destroys Asgard, and teams up Thor with Hulk. Post-credits leads directly into Infinity War.

title: Black Panther
notes: First MCU film to win an Academy Award. Introduces and explores the nation of Wakanda.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
notes: Thanos collects the Infinity Stones and wipes out half of all life in the universe.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
notes: Set before Infinity War. Explores the Quantum Realm further. Post-credits shows the snap's effect on the main cast.

title: Captain Marvel
notes: Set in the 1990s, introduces Carol Danvers. Mid-credits scene leads directly into Endgame.

title: Avengers: Endgame
notes: Conclusion of the Infinity Saga. Features time travel and the final battle against Thanos.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
notes: Epilogue to the Infinity Saga. Deals with the aftermath of the Blip and introduces Mysterio. Mid-credits reveals Spider-Man's identity to the world.
